Package io.anserini.collection

Class JsonCollection

java.lang.Object
io.anserini.collection.DocumentCollection<JsonCollection.Document>
io.anserini.collection.JsonCollection
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<FileSegment<JsonCollection.Document>>
public class JsonCollection
extends DocumentCollection<JsonCollection.Document>
A JSON document collection. This class reads all .json files in the input directory. Inside each file is either a JSON Object (one document) or a JSON Array (multiple documents) or a JSON Document on each line (not actually valid Json String) Example of JSON Object: 
 {
   "id": "doc1",
   "contents": "this is the contents."
 }
Example of JSON Array: 
 [
   {
     "id": "doc1",
     "contents": "this is the contents 1."
   },
   {
     "id": "doc2",
     "contents": "this is the contents 2."
   }
 ]
Example of JSON objects, each per line (not actually valid Json String): 
 {"id": "doc1", "contents": "this is the contents 1."}
 {"id": "doc2", "contents": "this is the contents 2."}
